sentences.english: During his tenur of office, he put forward a series of new ideas on law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 彭真对司法工作提出了一系列富有远见的思想。

sentences.english: After three days of celebration, Peng ran out of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 在庆祝了三天之后，彭真的不知道应该继续煮什么。

sentences.english: This year is birthday of Peng Zhen of revolutionist of older generation proletariat 100 years.
sentences.chinese: 今年是老一辈无产阶级革命家彭真诞辰100周年。

sentences.english: To write a letter to Mayor Peng Zhen, who was in charge of urban construction.
sentences.chinese: 给主管建设的彭真市长写了一封信。

definition: Liu Shaoqi (1898-1969), Chinese communist leader, a martyr of the Cultural Revolution
Bo Yibo (1908-2007), ranking PRC politician, served on State Council from 1950s to 1980s as colleague of Deng Xiaoping
Zhang Wentian (1900-1976), CCP party leader and theorist
Chen Boda (1904-1989), communist party theorist, interpreter of Maoism
Zhang Chunqiao (1917-2005), one of the Gang of Four
Yang Shangkun (1907-1998), former president of PRC and military leader
Zhou Enlai (1898-1976), Chinese communist leader, prime minister 1949-1976
Deng Xiaoping (1904-1997), Chinese communist leader, de facto leader of PRC 1978-1990 and creator of "socialism with Chinese characteristics"
Hua Guofeng (1921-2008), leader of Chinese Communist Party after the Cultural Revolution
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
Li Xiannian (1909-1992), PRC general and politician
Dong Biwu (1886-1975), one of the founders of the Chinese communist party
Chen Yi (1901-1972), communist general and politician, Marshal of PLA from 1955, Mayor of Shanghai in 1950s, PRC foreign minister 1958-1972
